overview: Don't Ask, Just Fuckis a major release for Raging Stallion's Monster Bang Studios - a Tony DiMarco event, this army themed movie offers a first look at our new batch of exclusive big-dicked superstars! These hung men are going to be the face of Raging Stallion Studios for the next year, and this is a chance for you to meet them for the first time.
tagline: Don't Ask, Just Fuck is a great take on a recurrent theme in gay porn. The cocks are big, and the men are hungry!
title: Don't Ask, Just Fuck
